steps.title: Your Openstax Tutor beta course dashboard
steps.body: Your course dashboard is your gateway to creating and managing assignments, as well as viewing student scores and progress.

steps.title: Adding assignments
steps.body: Add assignments by clicking or dragging to your calendar.

steps.title: Managing assignments
steps.body: You can edit an assignment or review student progress and performance by clicking on the assignment on your calendar.

steps.title: Performance forecast
steps.body: See how students are doing on each topic.

steps.title: Student scores
steps.body: View, manage, and export student scores for all assignments.

steps.title: Question library
steps.body: Manage the questions students see in assignments and when they practice on their own.

steps.title: Browse the book
steps.body: Review the OpenStax textbook content here.
